title: PHS R Templates

title: PHS R Templates
text: working inside PHS network, R set install packages internal package manager repository (example, using R Posit Workbench), can install package running Otherwise, install package Github running following code R: encounter issues automatic installation package dependencies using method, may need install manually prior running code install phstemplates. case, tell packages need. example, need flextable officer, install first:
code: install.packages("phstemplates") remotes::install_github("Public-Health-Scotland/phstemplates", ref = "main") install.packages(c("flextable", "officer"))

title: PHS R Templates
text: use project template, install package following instructions . able create new R projects recommended PHS structure within RStudio clicking File -> New Project… -> New Directory selecting PHS R Project Template Name project select location project folder. original author can also input - automatically add name top section default scripts within project. can edit files folders appropriate, e.g. rename R script files create new sub-folders. default files folders contained within project described subsequent sections README. template aims instill best practice within PHS therefore git initialised version control. However, using can delete .gitignore file. information version control. using git version control please aware .gitignore contains minimum recommended file types folders stop data tracked pushed GitHub. guidance using git GitHub securely can found . template also intended flexible, may require every file folder. example, written long multiple functions recommend saving dedicated functions.R file, can sourced within main script(s). Additionally, using many packages saved within packages.R file sourced similarly. However, decisions whether files required exact structure folders scripts left analyst’s discretion. guidance structuring writing R scripts follow organisation’s R Style Guide.

title: PHS R Templates
text: code.R - example structure main R script(s) functions.R - functions sourced used main script(s) packages.R - list packages sourced used main script(s) basefiles output temporary

title: PHS R Templates
text: .gitignore - tells git files folders track upload GitHub README.md - page .Rprofile - R profile settings r-project.Proj - R project

what: Adding a PHS gitignore or CSS file to an existing directory
title: PHS R Templates
text: want add PHS style .gitignore given directory, can R Studio selecting Addins top banner scrolling PHSTEMPLATES section choosing Add PHS .gitignore file. allow choose location new .gitignore file. can also directly R console using command phstemplates::add_gitignore(). add PHS style CSS file, use Addins menu choose Add PHS style CSS file, allow choose location save file. also ask want include Shiny CSS styles file – optional. can also running phstemplates::add_stylecss().

title: PHS R Templates
text: package currently provides RMarkdown templates : PHS official statistics report summary documents PHS accredited official statistics report summary documents PHS official statistics development report summary documents PHS management information report, summary one-page documents Please note templates require pandoc v2 (RStudio v1.2 comes required version pandoc). can check version pandoc rmarkdown::pandoc_version(). can access templates RStudio clicking File -> New File -> R Markdown -> Template. template loaded, document can produced clicking Knit button. Alternatively, can use render() function produce document. may preferable want automate production several different reports. example code official statistics template.
code: rmarkdown::render(   input = "my_report.Rmd",   output_format = phstemplates::phs_report_docx(     reference_docx = "phs-offstats-report.docx",     cover_page = "phs-offstats-cover.docx",     cover_title = "My Report Title",     cover_subtitle = "My Report Subtitle",     cover_date = "01 01 2024",     toc_depth = 3   ),   output_file = "my_report.docx" )

title: PHS R Templates
text: Clone phstemplates load RStudio Create Git branch switch branch R, type usethis::use_rmarkdown_template("-template") replace -template name want give template. actually just name gives folder stores template name spaces can contain dashes underscores. name also long may cause issues building package. create basic structure template within directory inst\rmarkdown\templates\-template Open template.yaml folder just created template. Update name description appropriate template. Go ‘skeleton’ folder (inst\rmarkdown\templates\-template\skeleton) delete skeleton.Rmd Copy paste RMarkdown template file associated files required template ‘skeleton’ folder (e.g. may MS Word reference document set styles) Rename RMarkdown template file skeleton.Rmd Run devtools::check() make sure package passes checks Run devtools::install(), restart RStudio check templates can loaded RStudio menus Push Github Create pull request ask review appropriate staff member changes can merged

title: PHS R Templates
text: Clone phstemplates load RStudio Create Git branch switch branch Rename updated template file skeleton.Rmd place (associated files also updated) inside ‘skeleton’ folder template (inst\rmarkdown\templates\-template\skeleton) Run devtools::check() make sure package passes checks Run devtools::install(), restart RStudio check templates can loaded RStudio menus Push Github Create pull request ask review appropriate staff member changes can merged

what: Convert to a PHS report in MS Word document format — phs_report_docx
title: Convert to a PHS report in MS Word document format — phs_report_docx
text: Format converting R Markdown PHS report MS Word document format. extension word_document format adds post-processing include front cover table contents report.

title: Convert to a PHS report in MS Word document format — phs_report_docx
code: phs_report_docx(   toc = FALSE,   toc_depth = 3,   number_sections = FALSE,   fig_width = 5,   fig_height = 4,   fig_caption = TRUE,   df_print = "default",   highlight = "default",   reference_docx = "default",   keep_md = FALSE,   md_extensions = NULL,   pandoc_args = NULL,   cover_page = NULL,   cover_title = "Title",   cover_subtitle = "Subtitle",   cover_date = "DD Month YYYY" )

title: Convert to a PHS report in MS Word document format — phs_report_docx
text: toc TRUE include table contents output toc_depth Depth headers include table contents number_sections TRUE number section headings fig_width Default width (inches) figures fig_height Default height (inches) figures fig_caption TRUE render figures captions df_print Method used printing data frames. Valid values include "default", "kable", "tibble", "paged". "default" method uses corresponding S3 method print, typically print.data.frame. "kable" method uses knitr::kable function. "tibble" method uses tibble package print summary data frame. "paged" method creates paginated HTML table (note method valid formats produce HTML). addition named methods can also pass arbitrary function used printing data frames. can disable df_print behavior entirely setting option rmarkdown.df_print FALSE. See Data frame printing section bookdown book examples. highlight Syntax highlighting style passed Pandoc. Supported built-styles include "default", "tango", "pygments", "kate",  "monochrome", "espresso", "zenburn", "haddock", "breezedark". Two custom styles also included, "arrow", accessible color scheme,   "rstudio", mimics default IDE theme. Alternatively, supply   path .theme file use   custom Pandoc   style. Note custom theme requires Pandoc 2.0+. Pass NULL prevent syntax highlighting. reference_docx Use specified file style reference producing docx file. best results, reference docx modified version docx file produced using pandoc. Pass "default" use rmarkdown default styles. keep_md Keep markdown file generated knitting. md_extensions Markdown extensions added removed default definition R Markdown. See rmarkdown_format additional details. pandoc_args Additional command line options pass pandoc cover_page Cover page document file name. cover_title Title used cover page. cover_subtitle Subtitle used cover page. cover_date Date used cover page.

title: Convert to a PHS report in MS Word document format — phs_report_docx
text: R Markdown output format pass render

title: Convert to a PHS report in MS Word document format — phs_report_docx
text: See online documentation additional details using word_document format. R Markdown documents can optional metadata used generate document header includes title, author, date. details see documentation R Markdown metadata. R Markdown documents also support citations. can find information markdown syntax citations Bibliographies Citations article online documentation.

title: Convert to a PHS report in MS Word document format — phs_report_docx
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ library(rmarkdown) library(phstemplates) render("input.Rmd", phs_report_docx()) } # }

text: path Filepath project. author Name main author project. n_scripts Number code files start project . git Initialise project Git. renv Initialise project package management using renv. overwrite Logical: Whether overwrite directory existing path creating directory.

title: phstemplates 1.2.2
text: compile_report() phs_report_docx() longer need search word ‘Introduction’ add table contents PHS report templates. PHS shiny app template now includes name app entered user top readme.

title: phstemplates 1.2.1
text: Updated accredited official statistics templates include accredited badge.

title: phstemplates 1.2.0
text: Updated official statistics, accredited official statistics (formerly national statistics), official statistics development management information templates 2024 versions. Removed use captioner package report templates longer CRAN.

title: phstemplates 1.1.1
text: Added three Management information templates Word documents, accessible RStudio menu: Management Info Report, Management Info Summary, , Management Info One Page template. Management Info One Page template accommodate using one page applies page numbers page 2 onwards, also used template simple information request response. Basic PHS style HTML template. RStudio addin add_stylecss() users can add PHS style.css file directly RStudio. RStudio addin update metadata existing R scripts latest update date R version run .

title: phstemplates 1.1.0
text: Added PHS shiny app template, accessible RStudio menus phsshinyapp().

title: phstemplates 1.0.1
text: Added add_gitignore() function allows user add PHS style .gitignore file given directory RStudio addin add_gitignore() users can add .gitignore directly RStudio. Minor updates template text fixed README link

title: phstemplates 1.0.0
text: Added phs_report_docx RMarkdown document type. Updated PHS official national stats report templates use phs_report_docx RMarkdown document type. Removed ISD national stats summary report templates.
